title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
description:
Frontiers released the first gameplay trailer for Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin, where you command four factions to conquer the Realm of Ghur in intense battles. The first beta test will run July 7-10, and the dates for the second test will be announced soon.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerofGaming

title: Starfield Interview: Todd Howard on Fulfilling His Vision, Xbox Performance, and More!
description:
Starfield game director Todd Howard joins us for an exclusive interview to discuss realizing his vision for Bethesda's imminent outer-space exploration RPG after all these years, how it performs on Xbox Series X|S, his favorite organic moments from the game, and more!

#IGN #Gaming #Starfield

title: Teardown - Official Creative Mode Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
description: Teardown is bringing you Creative Mode, a brand-new feature that will allow you to build whatever your heart desires like LEGOs. Creative Mode comes to Teardown on June 15.

title: How Starfield's character creator works #starfield #gaming #bethesda #ignsummerofgaming #shorts
Starfield's framerate on Xbox #starfield #bethesda #gaming #ignsummerofgaming #shorts
This Elder Scrolls character is in Starfield #bethesda #gaming #ignsummerofgaming #shorts
Baldur’s Gate 3 - Official Behind-The-Scenes Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
description:
Baldur’s Gate 3 is a party-based RPG that's full of story and set in the world of Dungeons and Dragons. Take a look at the latest behind-the-scenes trailer that details the work that was put into The City since players last stepped foot in it 20 years ago. Baldur’s Gate 3 launches on August 31 for PlayStation 5, Mac, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerofGaming

title: check it out #keanureeves #cyberpunk #ignsummerofgaming #gaming #johnwick #shorts
We are HYPED for the Microsoft Flight Simulator update #flightsimulator #ignsummerofgaming #shorts
Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty Hands On Gameplay Preview - IGN Access
description:
CDPR gave us the opportunity to play an extended demo of the Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty. We had an hour and a half to explore Dogtown, the new location featured in the game, the new relic enhancements, and of course, we had a little chat in-game with Idris Elba's character Solomon Reed.

Stay tuned to IGN Summer of Gaming 2023 for all of your PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, and PC game news, reveals and gameplay.

Presented by The Marines.

title: Starfield - Xbox Hardware Overview | Starfield Direct 2023
description:
Todd Howard unveils a few pieces of hardware created for Starfield: A wrist watch which replicates the watch your character wears in-game, a custom headset, and a custom limited edition Starfield Xbox controller, all inspired by the aesthetics of your ship in the game! 


#IGN #Gaming #Starfield

title: Still Wakes the Deep - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
The sea is a dangerous place, and Still Wakes the Deep showcases that. Get your first look at gameplay for this horror game based at sea. Still Wakes the Deep will be arriving in early 2024 for Xbox and Game Pass.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Fable - Official Teaser Trailer (4K) | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Meet Dave the vegetable enthusiast, who thinks the age of heroes is over. He also might be a giant, and just hasn't seen a hero in a while. Either way, Fable is back. Coming to Game Pass day one.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Dungeons of Hinterberg - Official Gameplay Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Take up your sword and pack for adventure in Dungeons of Hinterberg, coming in 2024.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Xbox Series S - Carbon Black Reveal Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Get a look at the upcoming Xbox Series S Carbon. The new 1 TB console will be arriving on September 1, 2023.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Clockwork Revolution - Reveal Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Get your first look at Clockwork Revolution, a new first-person action-adventure set in a steampunk Victorian world. Developed by inXile Entertainment, Clockwork Revolution is coming..."in due time."

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Towerborne - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
From the creators of The Banner Saga comes Towerborne, a new co-op adventure in an ever-changing world. Slay monsters, gather loot, and save humanity, coming in 2024.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Metaphor: ReFantazio - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
From the creators of Persona 3 and 4 comes a new game called Metaphor: ReFantazio. Get your first look at gameplay and story for the upcoming game for Xbox Series X/S and PC arriving in 2024.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Cities: Skylines 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
The world is what you make it in Cities: Skylines II, coming on October 24. 

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty - Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Keanu Reeves introduces the official trailer for the upcoming Cyberpunk 2077 expansion from CD Projekt Red. Visit Dogtown, rescue the president, and fight for your life alongside newcomer Idris Elba. Phantom Liberty will be released on September 26, 2023 for Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: 33 Immortals - Official Announcement Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Check out the announcement trailer for 33 Immortals, an upcoming co-op action-roguelike game for 33 players, as revealed during the Xbox Showcase on June 11, 2023. In 33 Immortals, play a damned soul, and rebel against God’s final judgment. 33 Immortals features what the developers at Thunder Lotus describe as “pick-up and raid” matchmaking, where you cooperate with your allies to survive against hordes of monsters and massive, challenging bosses. 33 Immortals will have a public beta period in Fall 2023, and will be available in Early Access on Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S, Windows PC, and with Xbox Game Pass for console and PC in 2024.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Persona 5 Tactica - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
The Phantom Thieves are back in Persona 5 Tactica, a new tactics spinoff of Persona 5, coming on November 17, 2023.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Jusant - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Climb to new heights in Jusant, a gorgeous climbing adventure from Don't Nod Entertainment, coming in Fall 2023.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Starfield - Story Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Bethesda gives us a new look at Starfield's story and gameplay. Take to the galaxy to find artifacts and unravel the mysteries of the universe as you traverse the stars. Starfield will arrive on September 6, 2023 for Xbox and PC.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG

title: Overwatch 2 - Official Update Release Date Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description:
Blizzard shows off gameplay and story for the upcoming update to Overwatch 2. Giant robots, co-op events, firing ranges, story missions, and more await you in Overwatch 2 on August 10.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG
